banner_desc: This site covers a lot of quality videos on dancing, so if you like to dance, then come join us!
whydctitle: There’s something special about dance that other forms of exercise just can’t beat.
whydc_desc: The joy of freeing your body to move with the music. The focus you need to own your space and hit each move. The connection you make with your dance crew. And the freedom to express your own style with what you wear and how you move. There’s nothing quite like it.
get_more_dance: Get more dance videos from OnlyDance
ourvideos: Our videos are geared towards a large user base, and our site contains a diverse mix of dance in three main styles: ballet, contemporary, and hip-hop!Let's dance!
top_desc: Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium doloremque laudantium, totam rem aperiam.
jack_desc: love love LOVE this concept. And getting to choose when and how long to work out for (in the form of dance!) in the comfort of my home is a serious blessing.
jonn_desc: So far great experience, love the fun but easy choreography, music and quality of videos. good intensity workout
lisa_desc: That was so much fun. I just wanted to say, 'Congratulations!' I just emailed my friends the link and look forward to more videos.
Register_now: Register now! We will send you best offers for your trip.

dancing_can: Dancing can also help you exercise, give you beautiful lines on your body and improve your overall appearance. It will make you the brightest star in the crowd wherever you go.
